headline: Agilent Technologies (NYSE:A) Expands Cancer Diagnostic Kit Indications In EU For NSCLC And Melanoma
summary: Agilent Technologies (NYSE:A) recently achieved EU IVDR approval for two new indications of its PD-L1 IHC 28-8 pharmDx kit, expanding treatment options for early-stage NSCLC and advanced melanoma. While this significant advancement in oncology diagnostics highlights the company's innovative edge, Agilent's stock saw a weekly decline of 3.51%. This price movement occurred against a backdrop of broader market volatility, driven by economic and political uncertainties including the Trump...
